title: How does Mojang come up with the ideas for mobs? - Quora

response.answer_text: When mojang comes up with a mod i think they look at user suggestions or what would be a good Addition to the minecraft world. Then, they would probably take a vote for the staff and then the minecraft community, because that’s what they did last time with the Phantom mob.

Well, you have the standard creatures, like zombies, spiders, and skeletons. I am not sure how a lot of the others were created, but I know that the creeper was actually made when they tried to make a pig. They messed up the axes when modelling the pig, so they ended up making a creeper.
